name: Major Tom (jacobisconfused)
description:
You play as Major Tom. The engines on his ship no longer work and you must use your cannon to get around and destroy all those in your way.

Two firsts here. First game and first game jam. I hope you enjoy it.

Use the mouse to aim. Left click to shoot. You can hold left click to charge up your shoot.

"r" to quick restart

Art from: https://mattwalkden.itch.io/lunar-battle-pack
